plan.goal: Add a copy of the order_items table to the thelook_ecommerce_local dataset and then add a view to summarise orders by user

steps.description: Create a copy of the bigquery-public-data.thelook_ecommerce.order_items table in the agentic-metric-monitor project, add it to the existing thelook_ecommerce_local dataset.
create a view in the agentic-metric-monitor project.thelook_ecommerce_local dataset that summarises orders by user.  draw on the users, orders and order_items tables
